definitions.definition: Smooth , even , aligned ; not sticking out.
examples: Sand down the excess until it is flush with the surface.
He just got a bonus so he's flush today.

definitions.definition: Ellipsis of flush left and right : a body of text aligned with both its left and right margins.
Full of vigor ; fresh; glowing; bright.
Affluent ; abounding; well furnished or supplied ; hence, liberal ; prodigal .

main_definition: Smooth , even , aligned ; not sticking out.
secondary_definitions: ( typography ) Ellipsis of flush left and right : a body of text aligned with both its left and right margins.
Full of vigor ; fresh; glowing; bright.
Affluent ; abounding; well furnished or supplied ; hence, liberal ; prodigal .
